column1: #text=Yesterday I went to the library to look at some books .
#text=My favorite type of books are books about animals .
#text=I love cats and wolves and many other fantastic creatures .
#text=My dad dropped me off at the library at 3:00 PM .
#text=I asked the librarian at the desk where I could find some books on animals .
#text=She directed me to a large shelf in the back .
#text=I started to look at the books and found one on wolves and another on leopards .
#text=I took the books off the shelf and sat down at a table .
#text=I started reading them and was so into them that I lost track of time .
#text=Soon it was 6:00 PM and my father was waiting outside to pick me up .
#text=I took both books to the front desk and had the librarian check them out for me .
#text=I was so excited to continue reading them and I went outside and we drove home .
